note:
As Ive got older I encounter more people losing their jobs because they stupidly used their real name on social media and something they said caused offense
So I'm Matt, why?
At age eight I realised that fossil fuels were a very limited energy source and pollution was an increasing issue
I became an environmentalist before it was politically correct
I follow for the smallest of reasons. Mastodon is very new and building the community is the only way it will grow.
An Adelaide boy
